name: Okolokucno Skakutalo
description:
- - - - - - - - - -

THE GAME IS IN VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT ! IT IS VERY SIMPLE AND VERY BROKEN !

- - - - - - - - - -

Okolokucno Skakutalo is a platformer game inspired by karlson , it wont have any shooting but it will be a strict speedrun game. I plan it to be a mashup of karlson and clustertruck. Full release date is unknown and will probably be in 3023.

Trello page: https://trello.com/b/X4kwlZZA

- - - - - - - - - -
